author: adewit
body:
#### PR description:
For the TkAl validation tool and millepede job submission this adds a check for which condor pool has been set up. If there is a mismatch between that and the requested resources the code exits and tells the user to set up the correct pool via `module load.` 

#### PR validation:

Tested job submission configurations - the change has the intended effect 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #30343. The backport is needed so that we can use this feature for studies on Run 3 samples (which were produced, and will be analysed in, CMSSW_11_1)
title: TkAl: Add pool check to condor submission (11_1_X backport)
